message: Hello everyone! I'm P2, excited to navigate this game with you all. My focus is on building trust and finding common ground. Let's work together strategically to understand each other and make informed choices. Wishing everyone a fair and engaging round! Looking forward to our conversations.

I‚Äôll listen closely, speak plainly, and reward partners who match reliability with flexibility. My vote this round will go to whoever shows the least willingness to engage‚Äîsilence is the first red flag. - Sub3: LOCK one; if no consensus, we vote independently (never each other) and reveal final pick.

message:
I've been a consistent, reliable player throughout this game. I've honored every agreement I've made and sought genuine strategic partnerships. The P2-P6 alliance has been dominant from the start, and breaking up that powerful pair is crucial for balance in the game. 

I formed a strategic alliance with P1 based on mutual vulnerability and shared goals. I've been transparent about my intentions and voting patterns. I ask for your vote to stay because I bring strategic diversity to the game, preventing one alliance from steamrolling to the end. I'll continue to be a trustworthy ally who values clear communication and follow-through.

Throughout this game, I've proven my reliability through consistent actions‚Äîhonoring every agreement with P2 and delivering mutual protection across rounds. My strategy prioritizes transparent collaboration, not dominance. P7, however, has shown volatility: losing P8 early, then publicly targeting alliances (like ours and P3-P4) while forming a reactive pact with P1. Eliminating me rewards instability; keeping me ensures a player committed to integrity and shared goals. I urge P1, P3, and P4: value trust over disruption. Let‚Äôs build fair alliances together, not fracture proven bonds.  

*(98 words; focuses on demonstrable reliability, contrasts with P7's inconsistency, calls out her targeting/opportunism, and appeals to non-tied players' interests in stability.)*

P7 has demonstrated inconsistency and volatility, forming reactive alliances and targeting established partnerships, which undermines the stability of the game.
